events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer reported wanting a refund due to receiving an incorrect product, so the case is categorized under Refund.
Assigning this refund request to customer service agent Emily for further assistance and resolution.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I’m here to help you with the refund process for your order.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can verify the issue?
Sure, my order number is 123456789. I’m attaching a photo showing the wrong product that arrived instead.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and send you a confirmation once done.
Thanks for the quick response. I appreciate your help and look forward to the refund confirmation.
Your refund has been processed successfully. You should see the amount back in your account within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund. Please let us know if there is anything else we can assist with.
Since the refund has been successfully received and no further issues were reported, we are closing this case now.
